verses.roman:
sei vapu, sei ākṛti pṛthak yadi bhāse
bhāvāveśa-bhede nāma 'vaibhava-prakāśe'

synonyms: sei vapu—that form; sei ākṛti—that feature; pṛthak—different; yadi—if; bhāse—appears; bhāva-āveśa—of the ecstatic emotion; bhede—according to varieties; nāma—named; vaibhava-prakāśe—vaibhava-prakāśa.
translation: "If one form or feature is differently manifested according to different emotional features, it is called vaibhava-prakāśa.
